title: 11 early Black Friday deals on Wahoo Fitness smart trainers and more
content:
As the days shorten and the weather worsens, riding indoors can be much more appealing than braving the winter roads.

If the change of seasons is tempting you to upgrade your indoor training set-up, you’re in luck. With Black Friday looming, lots of indoor cycling deals are appearing.

Deals on Wahoo smart trainers, turbo trainer accessories, bike computers and pedals are now available directly from Wahoo Fitness and other online retailers.

Here are the best deals we’ve found for you, ahead of Black Friday.

Early Wahoo Fitness Black Friday deals

Wahoo KICKR CORE and Zwift one-year membership bundle – £649.99 / $699.99

Our Media

Wahoo has teamed up with Zwift to offer a 12-month membership when you buy selected smart trainers from wahoofitness.com.

The bundles include a wide range of price points to suit your budget – from the entry-level Wahoo KICKR CORE to the top-of-the-range KICKR MOVE and KICKR BIKE.

The bundle we’ve featured here, featuring the KICKR CORE, combines Wahoo’s most affordable direct-drive, smart trainer with a year’s subscription to the popular indoor cycling app.

With the highly-rated Wahoo KICKR CORE currently retailing for about £549 / $682.50 and a 12-month Zwift membership worth £129.99 / $149.99, this deal is a bargain.

  • Buy the Wahoo KICKR CORE and one-year Zwift membership from Wahoo Fitness for £649.99 / $699.99

Wahoo KICKR MOVE and CLIMB bundle – £1,849.99 / $2,200

Our Media

This bundle pairs the Wahoo KICKR MOVE, a smart trainer that rocks back and forth as you pedal, with the KICKR CLIMB, which raises and drops your bike to simulate gradient changes.

The KICKR MOVE costs £1,399.99 / $1,599.99 / €1,599.99 and the KICKR CLIMB retails for £529.99 / $699.99.

You’ll save £125.97 / $149.97 by buying them together, and give yourself one of the most realistic indoor training setups out there, in the process.

  • Buy the Wahoo KICKR MOVE and CLIMB bundle from Wahoo Fitness for £1,849.99 / $2,200

Wahoo KICKR CORE and indoor essentials bundle – from £773.97 / $950.57

Our Media

This is another deal on the Wahoo KICKR CORE but with your choice of accessory.

Pick from the KICKR Indoor Cycling Desk Stand (£229.99 / $299.99) to hold your phone, tablet and/or laptop and anything else you want to hand, such as water bottles.

Or, go for the KICKR HEADWIND Bluetooth Fan (£229.99 / $299.99) which will help to keep you cooler when doing high-intensity intervals.

  • Buy the Wahoo KICKR CORE and indoor essentials bundle from £773.97 / $950.57 at Wahoo Fitness

Wahoo KICKR AXIS Feet – £64.99 / $80.79 £30 / $37.30 (save 54%)

Simon von Bromley / Our Media

The Wahoo KICKR AXIS Feet enables the KICKR smart trainer to move from from side to side as you pedal.

With three different stiffness options provided – easy, medium and hard – the KICKR AXIS Feet allow cyclists to customise the ride feel by providing up to five degrees of movement.

The aim here is to improve realism, whether spinning or sprinting, and improve comfort by minimising the pressure on touchpoints.

Sigma Sports has discounted the AXIS Feet by more than 50 per cent.

  • Buy the Wahoo KICKR AXIS Feet with a 54% saving from Sigma Sports

Wahoo KICKR CORE – £699.99 / $870.21 £549 / $682.50 (save 22%)

Our Media

While we’ve already highlighted Wahoo’s smart trainer bundles with Zwift, not everyone out there wants a membership to the indoor training app.

After all, other indoor cycling apps are available, including Wahoo SYSTM, TrainerRoad and Rouvy.

You can pick up a cut-price Wahoo KICKR CORE on its own with almost a quarter off from Sigma Sports.

  • Buy the Wahoo KICKR CORE with a 22% saving from Sigma Sports

Wahoo KICKR SNAP – £429.99 £299.99 (save 30%)

Wahoo Fitness

The Wahoo KICKR SNAP is a wheel-on smart trainer, meaning it connects to sensors and devices, enabling you to use Zwift, but you ride with your bike’s regular wheel attached.

Wahoo’s entry-level smart trainer is now even more affordable thanks to a 30 per cent reduction from Tredz.

  • Buy the Wahoo KICKR SNAP with a 30% saving from Tredz

Wahoo KICKR V6 – £1,099 £954 (save 14%)

Simon von Bromley / Our Media

Wahoo’s long-standing, high-end smart trainer, the Wahoo KICKR V6, is now available with £145.99 off at from Tredz.

We were extremely impressed with the sixth iteration of the KICKR V6 in our review, describing it as one of the best smart trainers available, thanks to its easy setup, fantastic ride feel, low noise levels and excellent power accuracy.

  • Buy the Wahoo KICKR V6 with a 14% saving from Tredz

Wahoo ELEMNT ROAM bundle – $479.99 $249.99 (save 48%)

Felix Smith / Our Media

We’ve focussed on Wahoo’s indoor training hardware so far, but this deal from Backcountry pairs the ELEMNT ROAM computer with a Wahoo TICKR heart-rate monitor, as well as speed and cadence sensors.

It looks to be impressive value, too, with 48 per cent off, bringing the bundle price down to $249.99

  • Buy the Wahoo ELEMNT ROAM bundle for $249.99 from Backcountry

Wahoo Indoor Training Starter Bundle – $699.99 $398.98 (save 35%)

Our Media

Back to the great indoors, and this ‘starter bundle’ from Backcountry combines the KICKR SNAP wheel-on smart trainer with Wahoo’s trainer mat and a cadence sensor.

If you’re just getting into indoor training, this combines the essentials to get you started on Zwift.

  • Buy the Wahoo Indoor Training Starter Bundle for $398.98 from Backcountry

Wahoo Speedplay Aero Pedals – $280 $195.93 (save 30%)

Wahoo Fitness

The Wahoo Speedplay Aero Pedals are said to be aero-optimised thanks to their stack height, which is lower than a standard road bike pedal, according to the brand.

Wahoo also says you can adjust the fore-aft and left-right position as well as float to find the perfect cleat position for you.

From REI, you can now save 30 per cent on a set.

  • Buy the Wahoo Speedplay Aero Pedals with a 30% saving from REI
author: Jack Evans
